message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $150?
I understand your concern about the price, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $175. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $160?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I can offer it to you for $165. It's a great compromise, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $155?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I can offer it to you for $162.50. It's a great compromise, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the deal.
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than $160. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $160?
